name: AudioPipes Extension
summary: Learn about .APEXT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: AudioPipes is a GUI-based audio processing application. It allows users to install additional features via plug-ins, also referred to as extensions. These extensions are saved as APEXT files.

description: An APEXT file is a plug-in for AudioPipes, an audio processing application. It can contain additional block types and other features. It may also contain executable Python code.

instructions: For instructions on how to install the plug-in an APEXT file contains, refer to AudioPipes' documentation.
